text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Privately owned residential community" means:
A homeowners association, as defined under the Maryland Homeowners Association Act;
A condominium, as defined under the Maryland Condominium Act; or
A cooperative housing association, as defined under the Maryland Cooperative Housing Corporation Act.

section.section: "Roadway" means a paved surface that provides vehicular access.
"Roadway" includes a paved surface designated for parking.
